title.narrative: 3. PROGRAMME PLANNING AND MONITORING

description.narrative: by 2022, UNICEF staff and partners are provided with guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan and monitor programmes, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral - Planning And Programme Reviews, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: by 2022, the country programme is efficiently designed, coordinated and supported to meet quality programming standards in attaining the results in favour of the most marginalized children.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: by 2022, UNICEF staff and partners are provided with guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan and monitor programmes

description.narrative: UNICEF Burkina Faso conducted the Strategic Moment of Reflexion (SMR) and annual review of its Country Programme Document (CPD) 2018-2022, which entailed extensive consultations with Government counterparts, CSOs, NGOs and children. It was an opportunity to conduct an in-depth analysis of the current situation given the continuous security and humanitarian crises in the country, to assess progress against results, identify and discuss lessons learnt and make appropriate adjustments based on the experience of the first two years of the country programme | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/01/2022
